metadata.title: CVE-2024-56635 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description:
In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:net: avoid potential UAF in default_operstate()syzbot reported an UAF in default_operstate() [1]Issue is a race between device and netns dismantles.After calling __rtnl_unlock() from netdev_run_todo(),we can not assume the netns of each device is still alive.Make sure the device is not in NETREG_UNREGISTERED state,and add an ASSERT_RTNL() before the call to__dev_get_by_index().We might move this ASSERT_RTNL() in __dev_get_by_index()in the future.[1]BUG: KASAN: slab-use-after-free in
